data.name: 0000 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I left the questioning to Koizumi, and the rest of us were with Haruhi.

data.name: 0001 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let me guess, you can't sit still, so you're going to jump straight to the investigation?

data.name: 0002 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course not. Before you start an investigation, you have to make preparations.

data.name: 0003 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That doesn't sound like Haruhi. She'd sooner run into a wall than plan around it.

data.name: 0005 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, what kind of "preparations" do you mean?

data.name: 0006 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I've already thought of everything we need to do, of course.

data.name: 0007 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Firstly, Mikuru, Yuki and Kyon, wait here.

data.name: 0008 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm going to be back in a bit. Got it?

data.name: 0009 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-Okay.

data.name: 0011 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi, where are you planning to go?

data.name: 0012 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Surely she's not planning to go investigate on her own, right?

data.name: 0013 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Preparations, just preparations. Now don't make a fuss and just stay in this room!

data.name: 0014 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I won't let you get away with it if you go investigating of your own accord!

data.name: 0015 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I get it.

data.name: 0016 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She stole the words I wanted to say. Is she even going to come back?

data.name: 0018 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Is she going to be okay by herself?

data.name: 0019 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well… Not that I can really say, but…

data.name: 0020 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I get the feeling she'll be fine.

data.name: 0021 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's the type of person to boldly declare what they're going to do, after all.

data.name: 0022 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I suppose you're right. Then, shall I make some tea while we wait?

data.name: 0023 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'd be very grateful.

data.name: 0024 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I get to drink Asahina's brewed sweetness, I could wait as long as you like.

data.name: 0026 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: How is it?

data.name: 0027 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's truly delicious. Today's tea is excellent yet again.

data.name: 0028 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehe, thank you very much. Please enjoy the rest of it.

data.name: 0029 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ahh, why of course.

data.name: 0030 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even though it's hot tea, it seeps through my body better than a cold juice.

data.name: 0031 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While single-mindedly savoring the sweetness, there was an aggressive knock on the door.

data.name: 0032 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Actually, maybe I should say it was kicked?

data.name: 0033 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What is it?

data.name: 0034 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon!

data.name: 0035 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: My hands are full, so hurry up and open the door!

data.name: 0036 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're a genuine idiot.

data.name: 0037 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When I opened the door, Haruhi fell in with a mountain of books.

data.name: 0038 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's the first thing you say? Aren't you going to at least thank me for opening the door?

data.name: 0039 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I don't worry about that trivial stuff. More importantly, I've got a hold of some material.

data.name: 0040 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Material? You mean this mountain of books?

data.name: 0041 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yes. Modern history of the local area, and material related to North High.

data.name: 0042 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wha… There's loads. We're going to search through these?

data.name: 0043 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course. Before examining the scene, you first must do a prior investigation.

data.name: 0044 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey now, I don't plan on taking supplementary history lessons in my summer holiday.

data.name: 0045 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This is way more fulfilling than supplementary lessons.

data.name: 0046 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Usually, there are true stories that become the origin of legends, right?

data.name: 0047 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is that how it is?

data.name: 0048 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's how it is. Therefore, we must first search from the ghost stories' source.

data.name: 0049 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The history of the area, and incidents from North High and such.

data.name: 0050 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So we'll divide it beween us and try to find stuff like that!

data.name: 0051 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She then started shoving books at us with such vigor that we couldn't say no.

data.name: 0052 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, I guess this is leagues better than walking around the school aimlessly.

data.name: 0053 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And thus, the SOS Brigade began diligently reading, as if we'd all become Nagato.

data.name: 0054 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: … Well, that was the intention at least. What's with all the noise?

data.name: 0055 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What the heck is this!

data.name: 0056 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: These boulders look so meaningful, but their origin is totally uninteresting!?

data.name: 0057 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I can't believe it. I wish it were better than that. Don't you agree?

data.name: 0058 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eh? Ah, yes. Y-You're right~

data.name: 0059 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems Haruhi has been completely absorbed by entertainment articles.

data.name: 0060 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Like, "Places you can find boulders that look like creatures…"

data.name: 0061 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Or, "An ominous antique was found in someone's storehouse," stuff like that.

data.name: 0062 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's binging stories that have no relation to our case.

data.name: 0065 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Our only hope is Nagato, who is the only one ignoring Haruhi and camly reading.

data.name: 0066 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Have you found anything relevant, Nagato?

data.name: 0067 (375.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: … At present, I haven't found anything with significant information written in it.

data.name: 0068 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh, okay…

data.name: 0069 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The material is so local to this area that it's only natural.

data.name: 0070 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We should've assumed there'd be nothing in the first place and saved ourselves some time.

data.name: 0071 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ahaha, the gifts in here make great material!

data.name: 0072 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I thought Haruhi would be in a bad mood if we couldn't find any information, but…

data.name: 0073 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She seems to be surprisingly enjoying herself, so it doesn't seem like a problem.

data.name: 0074 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How about you, Kyon? Have you found any funny articles?

data.name: 0075 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you do, make sure to tell me.

data.name: 0076 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Funny articles? Since when was that our main objective?

data.name: 0077 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How can I pass the time?

data.name: 0080 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How are you doing, Asahina?

data.name: 0081 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh?

data.name: 0082 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Gyah!?

data.name: 0083 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina turned around in a panic, and her hand hit the teapot.

data.name: 0084 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The tea spilled everywhere, even making one of the books wet.

data.name: 0085 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you okay, Asahina?

data.name: 0086 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm okay, but… I got some of our material wet. What should I do?

data.name: 0087 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Part of the paper swelled up, and the letters started running, becoming unreadable.

data.name: 0088 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even if you tried to dry it, it would just smudge.

data.name: 0089 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeeep… Suzumiya… This was important, wasn't it?

data.name: 0090 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It seemed like it had been stowed away for many years, so it can't have been that important.

data.name: 0091 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: As long as you destroy the evidence, it's all good.

data.name: 0092 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How do you plan to destroy the evidence?

data.name: 0093 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Burning, maybe. It's fine though, they had loads of extra copies that looked exactly the same.

data.name: 0094 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Truly the muttering of a demon. What Haruhi says is true, though.

data.name: 0095 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll get rid of the book.

data.name: 0096 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A #P05smudged book#P01, huh…

data.name: 0097 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe, rather than throwing it away over there, it'd be safer for me to keep hold of it.

data.name: 0099 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sorry, Nagato. You didn't find any funny articles, did you?

data.name: 0100 (375.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: … Funny articles?

data.name: 0101 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She looked at me with a curious expression.

data.name: 0102 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Uh, I couldn't help but ask for help, but maybe I should've phrased my question better.

data.name: 0103 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In other words, stories you read that you thought were unique, maybe.

data.name: 0104 (375.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: … This?

data.name: 0105 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She slightly tilted her head as she handed it to me. Th-this is…

data.name: 0106 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was the design document for a uniqueness award an old North High student received.

data.name: 0107 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's a very literal interpretation, I guess…

data.name: 0108 (375.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: … Yes.

data.name: 0109 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Actually, it's technically not wrong, but it kind of misses the point.

data.name: 0111 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon! Stop relying on Yuki and search for yourself!

data.name: 0112 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Yes, yes, I'm on it.

data.name: 0113 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll keep a mental note of #P05Nagato's design document#P01 that she just showed me.

data.name: 0115 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, in the end my attempt to get help came to nothing. I'll get back to reading.

data.name: 0116 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: By the way, since when did our objective change to finding funny articles?

data.name: 0117 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I wasn't paying any attention, so I didn't notice.

data.name: 0118 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Both Mikuru and Yuki found absolutely hilarious articles.

data.name: 0119 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: For goodness' sake, Kyon, you must be blind.

data.name: 0120 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What!? Since when did those two both find that kind of thing!?

data.name: 0121 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Neither of them acted like they had when I just asked them.

data.name: 0122 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: As a punishment for you being the only one to not find anything, go buy juice.

data.name: 0123 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Enough for everyone here, of course.

data.name: 0124 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why does it have to be this way?

data.name: 0126 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um, if you're thirsty, I can make some more tea?

data.name: 0127 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm fine for now. Besides, it's hot today so it's best everyone had juice, right?

data.name: 0128 (375.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eh? U-um, I'm not thirsty yet, so…

data.name: 0130 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato was making the same cool face as usual.

data.name: 0131 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi, Asahina and I were all reading together in this hot room.

data.name: 0132 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Truth be told, I was starting to get quite sweaty.

data.name: 0133 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You already treated us to tea earlier, I'll gladly go buy everyone some juice.

data.name: 0134 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Right. If it's for Asahina's sake, such trivial punishment is nothing.

data.name: 0135 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, Kyon. Go get it as quickly as possible!

data.name: 0136 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And it better be freezing cold! Hurry up!

data.name: 0137 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm tempted to buy ice and throw it at you. Good grief.

data.name: 0140 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my, we meet at such a perfect time.

data.name: 0141 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I came across Koizumi while out buying juice.

data.name: 0142 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm not going to buy you juice if you turn up out of nowhere as if it were your plan all along.

data.name: 0143 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm fine. More importantly, there's something I want your help with.

data.name: 0144 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: With what?

data.name: 0145 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A method of hindering Haruhi's investigation. It's a bit of a bother to do it by myself.

data.name: 0146 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Got it. If that's what you want, I'll gladly help.

data.name: 0147 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then if you'd follow me…

data.name: 0149 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, what are we doing here?

data.name: 0150 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi took me outside class 1-6.

data.name: 0151 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Would you mind helping me take the plate from this classroom?

data.name: 0152 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then we'll put class 7's plate in and shift all the classes plates across.

data.name: 0153 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't mind, but what's the point in doing all that?

data.name: 0154 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's a plan to set up a simple little trick.

data.name: 0155 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Doing so, it'll cause an illusion as you move along from class 6…

data.name: 0156 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The plan is to create another classroom next to 1-9.

data.name: 0157 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see. So at a glance, it'll probably appear as if class 10 is there.

data.name: 0158 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Rather than a trick, it's more on the level of a child's low quality prank.

data.name: 0159 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, but that's fine.

data.name: 0160 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The computer society members misunderstood beacuse of someone's prank…

data.name: 0161 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How does that plot sound?

data.name: 0162 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not bad, I think.

data.name: 0163 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's an elementary trick from mystery novels.

data.name: 0164 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I think it could buy us some time.

data.name: 0165 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I agree. Let's quickly change them out while Haruhi can't see.

data.name: 0166 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We got straight to preparing for Koizumi's trick.

data.name: 0167 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Okay, the plate is off.

data.name: 0168 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What? Who would call me at a time like this? Gah! It's not Haruhi, is it?

data.name: 0169 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Don't worry about me, answer the call. The trick is a secret, remember.

data.name: 0170 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: … H-Hello? What's going on, all of a sudden, Haruhi?

data.name: 0171 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's going on? You stole the words from my mouth! How far are you going for the juice?

data.name: 0172 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Did you forget I told you to be as quick as possible?

data.name: 0173 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You genuine imbecile, Kyon!

data.name: 0174 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: O, oh yeah, you did say that. Sorry.

data.name: 0175 (375.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Enough with the excuses! Get back here quickly! In the next 3 seconds!

data.name: 0176 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's impossible! … She disconnected right after telling me.

data.name: 0177 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It seems like I've asked for help at a busy time. My apologies.

data.name: 0178 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No, it's my fault for forgetting I was in a hurry.

data.name: 0179 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And we only got the plate off.

data.name: 0180 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'll do what I can by myself from now on.

data.name: 0181 (375.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: For now it's best to try not to dampen Suzumiya's mood too much.

data.name: 0182 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, that's right.

data.name: 0183 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd better get back quickly, though what should I do about the plate we took off?

data.name: 0184 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't just leave it here, I have no choice but to take it with me.

data.name: 0185 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's quite bulky, but I'll take the #P05class 6 plate#P01 with me inside my blazer.

data.name: 0186 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's obviously no way I can take something like this with me.

data.name: 0187 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll hide it behind something until we later fix it.

data.name: 0188 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? There's something else here. An #P05answer sheet#P00 for a test?

data.name: 0189 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They probably failed and hid it.

data.name: 0190 (375.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems old. Maybe I'll throw it out, later…

data.name: 0191 (375.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oops, if I don't get back to the clubroom fast, I'll get another call from Haruhi.

data.name: 0192 (375.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Ask Mikuru for help

data.name: 0193 (375.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Ask Nagato for help.

data.name: 0194 (375.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Carry it.

data.name: 0195 (375.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Hide it around there.
